name: Out of the Punso and Into the World
name_original: Out of the Punso and Into the World
description:
You are duendes, fresh out of the punso and into the world. More than finding a job or facing discrimination, there’s one thing that daunts you in particular: dating! You’re all users of the popular dating app called Mound (a homage to your termite mound-dwelling ancestors). Oh my goodness you are so nervous do you even have any cute pictures?!

An exploration of the queer experience of dating in the age of social media and online applications. A submission for Goblin Week 2020 Jam.
